definition.procedurexml: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?><xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><variables><variable id="damage" type="Number">damage</variable><variable id="distance" type="Number">distance</variable><variable id="hit" type="Boolean">hit</variable><variable id="particle" type="Boolean">particle</variable></variables><block deletable="false" type="event_trigger" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block inline="false" type="call_procedure_at"><field name="procedure">BonbExplode</field><value name="x"><block type="math_dual_ops"><field name="OP">ADD</field><value name="A"><block type="coord_x"/></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0.5</field></block></value></block></value><value name="y"><block type="math_dual_ops"><field name="OP">ADD</field><value name="A"><block type="coord_y"/></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0.5</field></block></value></block></value><value name="z"><block type="math_dual_ops"><field name="OP">ADD</field><value name="A"><block type="coord_z"/></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0.5</field></block></value></block></value></block></next></block></xml>
